name: Itts 2102 - Demo
description:
Itts 2102 is a demo of an exploration-based adventure game with dialogues and plot. It is seen from a top-down perspective.  The player lives in a apartment by himself.  The game starts in a multi-room apartment. In this demo the player can't leave the apartment. In the final version of the game there will be NPCs to talk to and many other objects to interact with. Game Artist & Designer: Adkyro Developer: Pasquale Silvestro

pasqualesilvestro.it
